Text: I was gonna wait for animeforever releases but these shinsen versions are pretty good too so here you go, two champloo episodes at once, you lucky bastards, enjoy!

Thank you :)
Double Joy is never wrong :)

Also, great episodes!
Great episode & what a clif-hanger at the end! Roll on episode 25&26 as quickly as you can ;)
